title: Markets 'functioning very well': Mnuchin
text:
Markets 'functioning very well': Mnuchin 5:33pm GMT - 00:55 
When asked Tuesday about the volatility of the stock markets over the past few days, U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin told a House hearing that the markets are ''functioning very well.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
When asked Tuesday about the volatility of the stock markets over the past few days, U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin told a House hearing that the markets are "functioning very well."
